page.title: 11STANION
page.content: Stanion is a small village .It has two farms the Bakers and the Binders farm. There is one church which is called St Peters Church and there is a chapel nearby.There are two shops the Wavy-line and the post-office,next to the post-office there is a pub called the Cardigan Arms,there is another pub called the Lord Nelson.In Stanion there are two garden centres.There is a wood which used to have a railway track running through but it was closed down a long time ago.There is a brook that runs through Stanion,it is the Harpers Brook.
